title: King Survivors
description: King Survivors is a roguelike game where you, as the valiant king, must form a skilled team of heroes to battle fearsome enemies. In this epic adventure, lead your heroes strategically and make critical decisions to save the kingdom. Hire powerful wizards, skilled hunters, and fearless knights with unique abilities. Control the King as heroes follow like a snake, avoiding collisions with enemies. The more kills, the more heroes join your ranks, ensuring a thrilling and action-packed experience!
